Class PolygonDyn

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polygon
      • PolygonDyn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, Shape

    public class PolygonDyn
extends Polygon
    PolygonDyn class is representing Polygons which holds the point by dynamic array. PolygonDyn is a class which extends from Polygon which implements Shape interface's methods, so does this class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Polygon

        Polygon.Point2D

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolygonDyn()
      Default constructor, initializes only a single point which is 1,1 into the dynamic array.
      PolygonDyn(java.util.ArrayList<Polygon.Point2D> points)
      Constructor that takes a array list of points, creates a new dynamic array and puts the values from the vector to the dynamic array
      PolygonDyn(Circle cir)
      Constructor that takes a circle, creates a new dynamic array and calculates the coordinates from circle values and puts them into the dynamic array.
      PolygonDyn(Rectangle rect)
      Constructor that takes a rectangle, creates a new dynamic array and calculates the coordinates from rectangle values and puts them into the dynamic array.
      PolygonDyn(Triangle tri)
      Constructor that takes a triangle, creates a new dynamic array and calculates the coordinates from triangle values and puts them into the dynamic array.
